description: Gets the public endorsement key associated with the Nitro Trusted Platform Module (NitroTPM) for the specified instance.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the instance for which to get the public endorsement key.

parameters.name: KeyType
parameters.description: The required public endorsement key type.

parameters.name: KeyFormat
parameters.description: The required public endorsement key format. Specify der for a DER-encoded public key that is compatible with OpenSSL. Specify tpmt for a TPM 2.0 format that is compatible with tpm2-tools. The returned key is base64 encoded.
